forumNotes.author: MedEvil
forumNotes.content:
If you're asking if you could use your Garmin as boot media. Possibly, if the computer detects it as a boot device.  

If you're asking if you can use the software on your Garmin on your computer. Not directly. You would first need an emulator.  

I know it can be done for WinCE devices. But Garmin uses it's own OS based on Linux. No idea if any emulator can handle it.
